getManagedAssets().details: Since lending is not allowed until all v1 pools are migrated, tracked pools will either be all v1 or all v2, never a mix

returns.valueSnapshot_: The snapshotted Maple Pool Token v1 value

returns.poolsV1_: The Maple V1 pools currently lent to

returns.poolsV2_: The Maple V2 pools currently lent to

init(bytes).details: Nothing to initialize for this contract

returns.isUsed_: True if the pool is lent to

params._actionData: Encoded data to execute the action

getDebtAssets().notice: Retrieves the debt assets (negative value) of the external position

getManagedAssets().notice: Retrieves the managed assets (positive value) of the external position

getPreMigrationValueSnapshotOfPoolTokenV.notice: Gets the snapshotted value of a given Maple Pool Token v1 in terms of its liquidity asset, taken prior to migration

getUsedLendingPoolsV1().notice: Gets all Maple V1 pools currently lent to

getUsedLendingPoolsV2().notice: Gets all Maple V2 pools currently lent to

isUsedLendingPoolV2(address).notice: Checks whether a pool V2 is currently lent to

migratePoolsV1ToV2().notice: Migrates tracked v1 pools to tracked v2 pools

receiveCallFromVault(bytes).notice: Receives and executes a call from the Vault

snapshotPoolTokenV1BalanceValues().notice: Creates a snapshot of all Maple Pool Token v1 balance values

documentation.text:
@notice Initializes the external position
 @dev Nothing to initialize for this contract

@notice Receives and executes a call from the Vault
 @param _actionData Encoded data to execute the action
@dev Claims all rewards accrued and send it to the Vault
@dev Helper to add a Maple v2 pool used by the position
@dev Cancels redemption request from a Maple V2 pool by removing shares from escrow (action)
@dev Lends assets to a Maple V2 pool (action)
@dev Redeems assets from a Maple V2 pool (action)
@dev Request to Redeem assets from a Maple V2 pool (action)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address[] memory,uint256[] memory) pure returns (address[] memory,uint256[] memory)

documentation.text: @dev Helper to get total pool token v2 balance, including escrowed amount

@notice Creates a snapshot of all Maple Pool Token v1 balance values
 @dev Callable by anybody

@notice Migrates tracked v1 pools to tracked v2 pools
 @dev Callable by anybody.
@dev Calculates the value of pool tokens referenced in liquidityAsset

@dev Helper to calculate the value of a v1 pool token balance of this contract,
 in terms of the pool's liquidityAsset

@notice Gets all Maple V1 pools currently lent to
 @return poolsV1_ The Maple V1 pools currently lent to

@notice Gets all Maple V2 pools currently lent to
 @return poolsV2_ The Maple V2 pools currently lent to
